Static Methods

public contains( string : String, pattern : String ) : Bool

parameters
search String to test.
pattern Pattern to find in test string.
returns
True if string contains pattern, else false.
Test if string contains another string.

public inline isEmpty( string : String ) : Bool

returns
True if string is empty.
Test if sting is empty.

public isInteger( s : String ) : Bool

parameters
s String to test.
returns
True if string is an Integer, else false.
Test string for Integer value.

public inline isNullOrEmpty( string : Null<String> ) : Bool

returns
True if string is null or empty.
Test if sting is null or empty.

public removeFromEnd( string : String, pattern : String ) : String

parameters
string String to remove pattern from.
pattern String to remove from end of other string.
returns
String with pattern removed from end.
Remove pattern from end of string.
